alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 5:26PM CDT until March 23 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS...NORTHWESTERN TANEY AND CHRISTIAN COUNTIES... At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highlandville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Ava, Sparta, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Spokane, Oldfield, Elkhead, Chestnutridge, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Christian Center, Garrison, Chadwick, Linden, Goodhope and Dogwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
